text: Hey Neal, I got a question about a few things if that's cool? Like a degree in masters, from your point of view, does seeing someone with a master's degree in VFX push them forward? Or does it depend more on a good showreel? And when it comes to compositing, or even joining as a runner, what would make me stand out from the crowd? And when it comes to writing a cover letter, have you read any good ones?
